title: BURNING DEADWOOD (2/X)
description:
Virtually Not Alone Network Event

Join @GrimGriz & @NechamaGluck as they process James W. Carey's 
"Technology and Ideology:  The Case of the Telegraph"
(available wherever you get your fine pdfs)
Part 2 of X
